data.title: The region's gateway to sustainable investing.
data.meta_site_name: Amanat - The region's gateway to sustainable investing.
data.text:
Amanat reserves the right to add to, modify or remove and more generally update at any time, all or part of these terms of use. Amanat will inform each visitor of the Site (a «User») about the modifications made to the present terms of use.

If the User does not respect these terms of use and if Amanat does not immediately react, this does not mean that Amanat waives its rights to act subsequently.

The User may not use the Site or its content for an improper purpose or a purpose forbidden by these terms of use, nor encourage any illegal activity, or other activity violating Amanats’s rights or third parties’ rights.

The User is not allowed to use mechanisms, programmes, algorithms or other automatic methods to access, obtain, copy or supervise any part of the Site, nor reproduce or bypass the navigation structure or the presentation of the Site in order to obtain data, documents or information. The User can only extract and/or re-use data, documents or information from the Site when this has been expressly authorized.

The User must not attempt to access unlawfully to any section or functionality of the Site, nor to any other system or connected network to the Site, nor to the services proposed on the Site, by hacking or using any other illegitimate means.

The User must not try to analyse or test the vulnerability of the Site or any connected network to the Site, nor violate the security and authentication measures put in place by the Site or the networks connected to the Site. The User is not authorized to question or trace information about other Users, or clients of Amanat, especially all Users’ accounts which are not his/her own, or set up at his/her initiative, nor to exploit the Site or the services or the information made available on the Site, in any manner, for the purpose of revealing such information, especially personal identification information or the information other than his/her own information, as they appear on the Site.

The User agrees to take no action imposing an undue or unreasonable burden on the Site’s infrastructure, or systems or Amanat’s networks, or any network connected to the Site or to Amanat.

The User agrees not to use any mechanism or software to interfere or try to interfere with the proper function of the Site or with any transaction conducted on the Site or with any use of the Site by any other person.

The User must not try to infringe the headers or manipulate the identifying information in any manner, to mask the origin of the message or of an information sent to Amanat using the Site, or a service offered by the Site. The User must not claim to be or represent someone else, nor pretend to be another natural or legal person.

Amanat reserves the right at any time to modify or suspend temporarily or permanently the use of this Site and may not be held responsible for these changes, suspension or interruptions. Also, Amanat declines all responsibility for the dysfunctions or interruptions during the use of the Site due to power failure, defection on telephone lines and/or internet or any other damaging event out of its control.

ACCESS

The Site is an information site published in English intended both for Amanat investors and non-investors.

The information contained on the Site is given strictly for informative purposes and does not entail any legal commitment or implicit or explicit contractual agreement on the part of Amanat, which also reserves the right to modify its characteristics at any time.

Access to any products and services presented on the Site may be subject to legal or regulatory restrictions for certain persons or in certain countries. None of the products and/or services will be supplied by Amanat to a person if the law applicable to him/her prohibits it. However, it is up to all persons concerned to check beforehand with their usual legal advisors that their legal and fiscal status permits them to subscribe to the products and/or services presented on the Site. Amanat declines all responsibility in case of violation of these restrictions by any person.

Access to the Site is free of charge. However, the costs of access and use of the telecommunications network shall be borne by the User, according to the terms stipulated by his/her Internet access provider and his/her telecom operator.

HYPERTEXT LINKS

The creation of hypertext links to the Site is subject to the explicit prior approval of Amanat.

The Site can contain hypertext links to other sites. The existence of hypertext links between the Site and third party sites means in no way that Amanat approves the content of that site or the use which may be made, and may not, under any circumstances, incur Amanat’s responsibility. The User visits the other sites at his/her own risks and under his/her responsibility.

Amanat does not accept any responsibility for any third party website linked to or from this website.

COPYRIGHT LAW

All the elements of the Site, individually and as a whole, are governed by applicable legislation on intellectual property, copyright law, trademark law. The same applies to the form of the Site (tree view, layout, design, conviviality…), as well as to its content (trademark, texts, images, illustrations, music, sounds…). These elements are the exclusive property of Amanat or are licensed to Amanat, and Amanat is the sole authorized user of such elements.

Any other complete or partial reproduction, representation or communication of the pages, the data and any other element constituting the Site, by any process and on any support, as well as their modification, is prohibited, with the exception of prior and written authorization of Amanat.

The non-compliance with such prohibition constitutes an infringement which can result in civil and criminal liability.

TECHNICAL INFORMATION

Amanat may not be held responsible for events out of its control and the potential damages suffered by the technical environment of the User and notably, his/her computers, software, network equipment or any other material to use the Site and/or information contained in it.

The confidentiality of correspondence is not guaranteed on the network and it is up to each User in particular to take all appropriate steps to protect his/her own data and/or software against contamination by any viruses circulating on the Internet.

The User agrees to compensate and release Amanat from all responsibility regarding losses or complaints from third parties, due to or in relation to the use made by such User of the Site.

COOKIES

Cookies are used on the Site in order to constantly improve the Site and to respond effectively to consumers expectations. By continuing using the site, you agree to the cookies policy

ABSENCE OF GUARANTEE

Amanat endeavours to keep this Site up to date. However, Amanat guarantees neither the accuracy nor the completeness of any information presented.

Besides, to the extent permitted by applicable law, Amanat may in no case be held responsible for any indirect loss, for whatever cause, origins, natures or consequences, resulting from a visit to the Site or associated with such a visit, particularly, and without limitation, for any loss of profits, interruption of activities or loss of software or data.
